title.full: My Cat vs Zombies Ep I
title.reduced: My Cat vs Zombies Ep I

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The zombie hordes of living dead monsters are hungry, and cat is on the menu.   Rascal the cat must use all her nine lives to survive this nightmare.  Kill zombies, build alliances, loot stashes and level up as you fight for survival in a world where cats have inherited human civilization.
